DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy CDB-2914 preventing pregnancy take 3 5 day unprotected sexual intercourse .
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 year Menstruating woman regular menstrual cycle 24 35 day intraindividual variation less equal 5 day Request emergency contraception 48 hour 120 hour unprotected intercourse define lack contraceptive use , condom breakage ( include condom lubricate spermicide ) barrier contraceptive method failure No current use hormonal contraception least one complete menstrual cycle ( 2 menses ) since stop hormonal contraception For woman recent history Depo Provera use , recent injection must least 9 month study entry follow least one complete menstrual cycle ( 2 menses ) Willing use hormonal method contraception study completion At least one complete menstrual cycle ( 2 menses ) post delivery , miscarriage abortion Able provide inform consent English Give voluntary , write informed consent , agree observe study requirement ( subject need available followup next 6 week ) Willing abstain act unprotected intercourse participation study pregnancy status ascertain One act one unprotected intercourse 120 hour request emergency contraception current cycle All act unprotected intercourse ( current cycle ) within 48 hour presentation Currently pregnant confirm positive HSUP test perform screen Currently breastfeed Current use hormonal contraception Use hormonal emergency contraception since last menstrual period Current use IUD Tubal ligation Partner vasectomy Unsure date last menstrual period Severe asthma insufficiently control oral glucocorticoid Currently enrol trial investigational medicine
